name: Prueba Modbus
info: Escribe y lee valores sobre un servidor local

name: Leer la temperatura de la CPU de la PI
info:
Lanza el comando vcgencmd measure_temp
y formatea el resultado, extrayendo el valor

name: Sin(x)
set flow context Inputs
func:
//flow.set('Actuador' , global.get("Actuador"))
flow.set('Actuador',  global.get("Actuador_Global")) 
flow.set('isoInput2', Math.random() + 12.0)
flow.set('isoInput3', Math.random() + 13.0)
flow.set('isoInput4', Math.random() + 14.0)
flow.set('isoInput5', Math.random() + 15.0)
flow.set('isoInput6', Math.random() + 16.0)
flow.set('isoInput7', Math.random() + 17.0)
flow.set('isoInput8', Math.random() + 18.0)

msg.payload = flow.get('Actuador');

return msg;

name: set flow context Outputs
func:
flow.set('isoOutput1', Math.random() + 1.0) 
flow.set('isoOutput2', Math.random() + 2.0)
flow.set('isoOutput3', Math.random() + 3.0)
flow.set('isoOutput4', Math.random() + 4.0)
flow.set('isoOutput5', Math.random() + 5.0)
flow.set('isoOutput6', Math.random() + 6.0)
flow.set('isoOutput7', Math.random() + 7.0)
flow.set('isoOutput8', Math.random() + 8.0)

msg.payload = [
    flow.get('isoOutput1'),
    flow.get('isoOutput2'),
    flow.get('isoOutput3'),
    flow.get('isoOutput4'),
    flow.get('isoOutput5'),
    flow.get('isoOutput6'),
    flow.get('isoOutput7'),
    flow.get('isoOutput8'),
]
return msg;
